Package edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CmtCCommitmentMsg
    This interface represents the commitment message sent from the committer to the receiver during the commitment phase.
    CmtCDecommitmentMessage
    General interface for the decommitment message the committer sends to the receiver.
    CmtCommitmentPhaseValues
    General interface of the committer's commit phase values.
    CmtCommitter
    This the general interface of the Committer side of a Commitment Scheme.
    CmtCommitValue
    General interface for commit value.
    CmtOnBigInteger
    Marker interface.
    CmtOnByteArray
    Marker interface.
    CmtOnGroupElement
    Marker interface.
    CmtRCommitPhaseOutput
    General interface of the receiver's output of the commit phase.
    CmtReceiver
    This the general interface of the Receiver side of a Commitment Scheme.
    CmtWithProofsCommitter
    This interface is used by the committer to prove that:
    CmtWithProofsReceiver
    This interface is used by the verifier to verify that:
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CmtBigIntegerCommitValue
    Concrete implementation of CommitValue where the committed value is a BigInteger.
    CmtByteArrayCommitValue
    Concrete implementation of CommitValue where the committed value is a byte[].
    CmtGroupElementCommitValue
    Concrete implementation of CommitValue where the committed value is a GroupElement.
    CmtRBasicCommitPhaseOutput
    Concrete class of receiver's output from the commit phase.
    CmtRTrapdoorCommitPhaseOutput
    Concrete class of receiver's output from the commit phase.
